testimonials.name: LYNN KUNIHIRA AKKY
testimonials.quote: All my children have gone through City Parents' School and I don't regret it at all. They brought the best out of them. My first born got 4 aggregates and is now at Kings College Budo. Thumbs up to the staff, pupils and parents of City Parents' School.

testimonials.name: KWAGZY BREEZY
testimonials.quote: City Parents' School molds what a parent wants their child to be. Their motto is to enable the future - they mold future leaders. Most of the head-prefects in top secondary schools are former City Parents' students. I encourage pupils to discover their talents here.

testimonials.name: CHARITY BYARUBAGA
testimonials.quote: City Parents' School has set a great academic pace in Central Region. It has not compromised our expectations. Big ups to the administration team and teaching staff!
